You are organizing a mini symposia for ISCB46 - many thanks for that! In this document we summarize answers to some common questions and further instructions. 

# Material

There is no need to upload your materials to conftool. We ask you to present from our own laptop. Support for setting things up will be availabe in the room.


# FAQs

For more general questions please refer to the [FAQs](faq.html).
